  • Classes in sorcer.core.provider used by sorcer.core.provider 
    Class and Description
    ProviderDelegate
    The provider delegate implements most of the intialization and configuration of service providers by dependency injection.
    ProviderDelegate.DeploymentConfiguration
    The configuration class for SORCER providers.
    ProviderException 
    ServiceProvider
    The ServiceProvider class is a type of Provider with dependency injection defined by a Jini 2 configuration, proxy management, and own service discovery management for registering its proxies.
    SpaceTaker
    This is a class creates a JavaSpace taker that extends the Thread class and implements the interfaces LeaseListener and SorcerConstants
    SpaceTaker.SpaceTakerData
